rows.label: qst201814_msg0001
rows.name: Are you all right?!

rows.label: qst201814_msg0002
rows.name:
You've come to help?
About time...

rows.label: qst201814_msg0003
rows.name:
Yeah, any longer and we'd have been
eaten!

rows.label: qst201814_msg0004
rows.name: Thank you!

rows.label: qst201814_msg0005
rows.name:
No thanks are needed!
I'm just glad you're all safe.

rows.label: qst201814_msg0006
rows.name:
Ah, I almost forgot!
Is someone here named Pepe?

rows.label: qst201814_msg0007
rows.name:
Did you say Pepe? I'm Pepe...
How do you know my name?

rows.label: qst201814_msg0008
rows.name:
Mimi, in Iyasaki Village, asked us
to find you!

rows.label: qst201814_msg0009
rows.name: Mimi did?!

rows.label: qst201814_msg0010
rows.name:
That's right!
She's been worried sick about you!

rows.label: qst201814_msg0011
rows.name:
Oh, that's bad...
I never meant to worry her...

rows.label: qst201814_msg0012
rows.name:
What's the reason you went on this
country-hopping journey, Pepe?

rows.label: qst201814_msg0013
rows.name:
From what I hear, you've been visiting
the various Phonex communities and
talking to their young people?

rows.label: qst201814_msg0014
rows.name:
I'll tell you.
I've been gathering Phonexes-in-arms
to eradicate monsters.

rows.label: qst201814_msg0015
rows.name: You want to fight monsters?

rows.label: qst201814_msg0016
rows.name: Yes!

rows.label: qst201814_msg0017
rows.name: You say you met Mimi in Iyasaki, right?

rows.label: qst201814_msg0018
rows.name:
She's... Ever since she's been attacked
by a big bad monster I call the Demon
King, she's been afraid to get out.

rows.label: qst201814_msg0019
rows.name:
Because of that, she can't even get
back to her family in the village.
She's been stuck for so long now.

rows.label: qst201814_msg0020
rows.name:
I want to defeat the Demon King
and free Mimi from her isolation!

rows.label: qst201814_msg0039
rows.name:
But I'd never manage alone...
So I went around the world, picking up
strong Phonexes to fight with me.

rows.label: qst201814_msg0021
rows.name: Wow, that's some story...

rows.label: qst201814_msg0022
rows.name:
But I guess my traveling is over.
My mission is a success!

rows.label: qst201814_msg0023
rows.name:
...Is that right? So I guess you've found
who you were looking for!

rows.label: qst201814_msg0024
rows.name:
Well, don't be coy!
Introduce me!

rows.label: qst201814_msg0025
rows.name: Um...

rows.label: qst201814_msg0040
rows.name: Well? What's wrong?

rows.label: qst201814_msg0026
rows.name:
Well, okay. The powerful ally I met
at the end of my long and perilous
journey...

rows.label: qst201814_msg0028
rows.name: That's you, Uka!

rows.label: qst201814_msg0029
rows.name:
Won't you come back to Liberalitas
with us and help us defeat the Demon
King in his lair on the Isle of Urchon?!

rows.label: qst201814_msg0030
rows.name:
Whuh?
Me?!

rows.label: qst201814_msg0031
rows.name:
Hold up, hold up.
I'm just Uka! I've not got that kinda...

rows.label: qst201814_msg0032
rows.name:
No, come on! I've seen your blinding
agility and your unstoppable headbutt!

rows.label: qst201814_msg0033
rows.name:
There's no way the Demon King
can stand against you!

rows.label: qst201814_msg0034
rows.name: Uhhh, but...

rows.label: qst201814_msg0035
rows.name:
Please!
You're our only hope, Uka,
mine and Mimi's!

rows.label: qst201814_msg0036
rows.name:
...Okay, I'll do it!
I mean, we've come this far, right?
Might as well see this thing through!

rows.label: qst201814_msg0037
rows.name:
Leave it to me and my Driver!
We'll do whatever's in our power!

rows.label: qst201814_msg0038
rows.name:
That Demon King in his lair on the Isle
of Urchon won't know what hit him!
